sn35.107:4.1: “Mendicants, I will teach you the origin and ending of the world.
sn35.107:4.3: And what, mendicants, is the origin of the world?
sn35.107:4.4: Eye consciousness arises dependent on the eye and sights.
sn35.107:4.5: The meeting of the three is contact.
sn35.107:4.6: Contact is a condition for feeling.
sn35.107:4.7: Feeling is a condition for craving.
sn35.107:4.8: Craving is a condition for grasping.
sn35.107:4.9: Grasping is a condition for future existence.
sn35.107:4.10: Future existence is a condition for rebirth.
sn35.107:4.11: Rebirth is a condition that gives rise to old age and death, sorrow, crying, pain, sadness, and distress.
sn35.107:4.12: This is the ending of the world. …
sn35.107:4.14: Mind consciousness arises dependent on the mind and phenomena.
sn35.107:4.15: The meeting of the three is contact.
sn35.107:4.16: Contact is a condition for feeling.
sn35.107:4.17: Feeling is a condition for craving.
sn35.107:4.18: Craving is a condition for grasping.
sn35.107:4.19: Grasping is a condition for future existence.
sn35.107:4.20: Future existence is a condition for rebirth.
sn35.107:4.21: Rebirth is a condition that gives rise to old age and death, sorrow, crying, pain, sadness, and distress.
sn35.107:4.22: This is the origin of the world.
sn35.107:5.1: And what is the ending of the world?
sn35.107:5.2: Eye consciousness arises dependent on the eye and sights.
sn35.107:5.3: The meeting of the three is contact.
sn35.107:5.4: Contact is a condition for feeling.
sn35.107:5.5: Feeling is a condition for craving.
sn35.107:5.6: When that craving fades away and ceases with nothing left over, grasping ceases.
sn35.107:5.7: When grasping ceases, future existence ceases.
sn35.107:5.8: When future existence ceases, rebirth ceases.
sn35.107:5.9: When rebirth ceases, old age and death, sorrow, crying, pain, sadness, and distress cease.
sn35.107:5.10: That is how this entire mass of suffering ceases.
sn35.107:5.11: This is the ending of the world. …
sn35.107:5.13: Mind consciousness arises dependent on the mind and phenomena.
sn35.107:5.14: The meeting of the three is contact.
sn35.107:5.15: Contact is a condition for feeling.
sn35.107:5.16: Feeling is a condition for craving.
sn35.107:5.17: When that craving fades away and ceases with nothing left over, grasping ceases.
sn35.107:5.19: That is how this entire mass of suffering ceases.
sn35.107:5.20: This is the ending of the world.”
